Blog.post: yaye! can't wait till florida. basketball thing cool. went shopping--not the best. but im going babysitting tonight so ill make $$$. bye florida countdown: 7 days
no school. hurrah. i reeeeally dont want to have school tomorow. but who does. BOTD: sublime my feet are cold fuck you ha p.s. xangas suck

snow snow snow. so yesterday i went to aprils n saw a movie. then went to yoga (which kicked ass). n then me ro sarah n april saw john q and looked at marcias hot ex-boyfriend. n then it was sleep sleep. and then i came home. jolly? oh wait! i forgot. so we were watching this movie n i was trying to say something but it turned out like this: somethings are like one thing but this is another. i also found out that i was trying to be "deep and poetic" says adam but no... i just messed up my words. but who am i to argue with a "mean intelect"?
yoga anyone? yeah well...and...grrr...but...no...hmmm :-/
ah...4 day weekend. i saw along came polly. twas so funny. BOTD: Linkin Park. HAHAHAHA! no way in hell BOTD:jet
hey--exams were ok. i dont really have anything to say. bored. BOTD: the distillers
AAAAH! EXAMS TOMORROW! but other then the horrible studying, this weekends been cool. eggs, yoga, fox n the hound, been cool. BOTD: The Doors old but still great
:-D hehe

well i dont really have very much time at the moment because im being poked by a long hard pencil. (shut up) so the BOTD (which means band of the day for stupid people like *april* ow) is HOT HOT HEAT what more can i say

dude i totaly understand why people write in these things. to say what they're thinking without bugging the shit out of people. i mean i dont even care if people read it, i just like writing in it. i mean i have alot to say and if people care, they can read it, n if they dont, they wont. i mean this is my 6th blog in 2 days. woah. ya know, at mayorga we were talking about abortion. i think that people should be able to have an abortion if they want to. it is none of anyone elses business. yeah.

today is a pretty good day man. mayorga was so good. i was diggin the roast beef sandwhich. guess who's watchin the fox n the hound tonight? muah. (is that how you spell it? probly not) but lets not forget the BOTD... OFFSPRING. ya know since i was in 3rd grade (when B*Witched came out) i have wanted to go to Ireland sooooo bad. and guess who's playing there? offspring. i so want to win those tickets from hfs. but seeing as i have about this much luck...i wont. ya know that guy tobey mcguire? hes really hot in a really dorky way. like the kind of guy where you're the only one who thinks hes hot ya know? maybe ya dont. who reads blogs anyway? i mean its just about peoples boring lives. and people who dont have boring lives, dont write in blogs. i mean look at this blog. who cares what band i liked in 3rd grade? no whats a great comic? zits. i can totally relate to the dude. funny. yeah i'm gunna go study for exams. who doesnt love doing that? people with lives. goodbye

do you ever feel like no one cares? like...they say they care--but do they really? i mean maybe mr. lookingatthisblognow cares, but you are probly just bored n looking at everybodys profiles. am i right?
BOTD: The Darkness-how can you not like a guy wearing a catsuit?

ya know i'm not a bitch on purpose. i do not go around trying to piss people and make them hate me. it just turns out that way. you wanna try being known to your best friends as the biggest bitch of all time and see how you deal with it. so for the time being your gunna have to just deal with it or leave me alone. got it?

i think i'm going to have bands of the day. todays BOTD: Yeah Yeah Yeahs. they have this really awesome song called miles away. Miles Away Lyrics As the cars go by under the sun like an enemy You Wonder (x3) As a spider comes and looks at you like an enemy You Wonder (x3) Yeah Miles, miles away She's hurting people in a better world Miles, miles away Dressed again in all her wonder You're more beautiful than ever Looking in the car's rear view mirror Floor is hard uncomforted By the second time she wondered she hungered she hungers like a killers wife As the cars go by (x3) Yeah as the cars go by Miles, miles away She's hurting people in a better world Miles, miles away Dressed again in all her wonder Well you're more beautiful than ever Looking in the car's rear view mirror You're more beautiful than ever Miles, Miles away (x2)
hey look: yo tengo un blog. i dunno what people are supposed to write in this ill write later

:-D i'm going to chicago tomorrow. so yesterday, i found out from someone that i'm always mean, and that i'm not nice to anyone. and apparently, if i continue to be this way--i'll have no friends. but this is coming from a friend whatever

today was very blah. revalation time: some people live these great lives ya know? like living in wonderful places, traveling all the time, not worrying about money. and they have fun and cool lives and love it. and then there are the people, who sit at home all the time or somtimes hang out with friends, but arent like reeeeeeally good at anything but not reeeeeally bad at anything. and they're pretty bitchy sometimes, partially because they are always being called a bitch. so there lives, compared to the rich swiss people are kinda sucky. but not realllly good n not reeeeeeeally bad. now shouldnt the cool rich traveling people share some of the fun.

yesterday was a bad day. i woke up n had to go to a bad batmitzvah. n there was a lunch thing. but we didn't go. then my mom yelled at me that it was my fault even though my dad was the one who didnt want to go. it was stupid. n then i had to do some stupid stuff. n rosie came over at 9:30 and we were supposed to go to aprils at 10:30 but they didn't call or anything. and then my dad got reeeeeeeeeeeeeally mad for making him stay up till 11:45 to drive us over there. but then april called saying that even though sarah could sleep over, well all couldn't. and then my dad yelled at me some more. and i went to bed.

yesterday was ok cuz it was friday and me n sarah had good french food. but also we got our high school registration forms which means this hell hole called middle school is almost over which makes me quite happy. and i dont want to take connections. you'd think that after 3 years preparing for high school and being in all GT that we'd know how to do our homework and take notes. maybe not. my batmitzvahs in a month. great except not. well seeing as my life is so facinating... i think i will go now

yeah...hmmm...i dunno. i hate ms deland? i mean ms jackson may suck but at least i learn something. delands like "no! gusta chuca wooka bladkflasjkl!jflkdashjfoiasdj! ñfmjlask!" and we're sposed to asume that means stuff.

florida was so fun. it was jsut like WOOOAH FUN. n i was like yeah. n today, well last night, we slept at the rosies house after me reading my stupid (but not actually stupid pretty good) book 1984 for school (which is what made it stupid). then today i went n got a cool bat mitzvah dress n had some soup n went to visit a lady in the hospital. fun aye?
florida tomorrow. score. the lady. and those nails. she could poke an eye out with them. i lost my pants. if anyone knows where they are, please tell me. cuz i dont. yeah well...
florida in...3 DAYS! hehe. i got food. i had ramen. i dont really have much to say "cheerleaders are dancers gone retarted" -sparky
last night was ok. spring break in 3+1/2+1/2 days left! even though everyone's leaving me--im still gunna have a rockin time with jules, sarah p., and elaina!
yaye! the partay last night was fantasmic! and it was the best day like....ever. and the happiest i've been in a long time. and.... thats all
yaye! my batmitzvahs over and the world will now be easier.
eesh! 6 days. yoga rocked today. my hairs red i have polka dotted socks. thats all

well today everyone was all excited cause they got into CAP. and its gunna be "like totally awesome!" me rosie and april went to Panera. and it was ok. it would have been good if april and rosie didn't talk about how excited they were to get into CAP. and how it's gunna suck cuz Breton didn't get in. but it doesn't matter that i didn't. cause as everyone knows "i'm a bitch who's not good at anything" and we went to april's with dylan and breton. it was cool minus the banging my head into the floor. and the bitching of my mom. and everyone's like "this is the best day ever!" but it wasn't

well yesterday day was a rock-my socks day. and it rocked my socks. h&m=good. minus the rosie got my shirt part. so i had a good day. but you all know what happens when i have good days... my parents ruin it.
urlLink
i went to the pro-choice march. it rocked so much. it was so cool seeing all the people and whatnot. whoppi goldberg and hilary clinton were there

woah--i haven't written in a while. well here's what i did today/yesterday: me april rosie breton alex dylan went to rosies. then they went to softball practice and i went to. then me natalie and helen went and got a shitload of exercise. then we sat and sat and sat. and then we went to aprils. and then me rosie and april slept at my house. and then we woke up and got dressed and whatnot. then Breton alex and dylan came over and we had a BBQ. Then we went and swam in the creak. then we took showers (except not with the dudes--they left) then april left and me ro and sarah did lots of hw then i went babysitting but they stayed (wierd huh?) and now rosie is at sarahs and i jsut got back but shes commin over in 45 minutes. night.

damn parents. anyway... we saw Halloween which wasn't scary but it was ok. And then we spent like 2 hours chatting and went to bed. The End... tomorrow Lindsay's comming over which will be fun and interesting cuz i havn't seen her in forever.

so yesterday i went shopping with elaina and jules! it was soooooo much fun! First we went to h&m and then we went to montgomery mall. i got some cool shirts and rockin earrings. Then we saw that shitty movie--Jersey Girl--gag. But then we went to Baja fresh which was yummmmmmay :-D And then we came back to my place and saw Halloween. This will be continued cuz my dad wants to have a "talk" with me. damn
yaye! tomorrow is friday! woooooooooooohoooooooooooo! then spring break! score!
well nothin interesting really happend today. but im going to see SHREK 2 tomorrow!

YAYE! the beach rocked so much! camping was cool although i don't think i could do it for more than like 2 days. so here's how it went: Friday: we went to se the rear window con sarah april rosie dylan y breton. Then us chicks went to aprils and the dudes went somewhere else. Then they came over till 11. Then it was off to bed at around 12 cause we had to get up at 7. Saturday: We woke up at 7, got dressed, packed, etc. then we were off at about 8:15. So we drove for about 3 hours, got to Asateague, set up camp (me, A, S, and R got a 6 person tent!) and went to the beach where we got tan/burnt/swam in the ice cold water. Then we went back, ate dinner, watched the sunset, and went for a walk on the beach. oh! there were horses! lots and lots of them! which means shitloads of shit. it was pretty gross. but that's ok. so we went back and went to sleep. Sunday: We got up at like 8 and ate breakfast and got paked and stuff. Then we went to the beach just to hang out cause we didnt want to go in the car all gross. but then, like 15 minutes before we were supposed to leave, we realized that there were showers. So we all went in the water and it was much fun! then it was off to eat and go home To anyone still reading this: GET A LIFE what are you doing still reading about my weekend? you must really love me! or are just bored probably the latter. bye
so yeah...nothing interesting going on. check it out i got a thing that counts how many times my page has been viewed (not total just since today)

well i haven't written in like a week so i will. thursday: slept at april's with rosie. friday: woke up, went to h&m where sarah was really late but thats a long story. then we bought our clothes etc, and went to potbelly's! :-D. then we went to McDonalds cause april wanted fries. then a really nice lady gave us a $. it was cool. then we played the people game which rocked. then we went home on the metro. we were walkin to aprils from the metro when these spanish dude were all "kissykissy" and we were like eew. then, like 4 seconds later these old men, and im talkin like 70 years old, no exaggeration are all dancing in their car and were like "shake it ladies" and we're like noooo. and then like 5 seconds after that, this abulance goes by and on the intecom thing is like "hey ladies" now thats just wrong. saturday: woke up, went to the bank to deposit all my bat mitzvah money. then me n rosie studied for w.s. till like 2. then sarah came over. then they left. then we met back up to go to elissa's party which was rockin. the end.
hey all. i'm going to camp tomorrow so you guys should e-mail me. campers@campfriendship.com put my name in the subject. see ya in 2 weeks.
ignore that
ever just feel like you're being left out of like...everything? yeah--it sucks.

yaye! 4 days until camp! oh i cannot wait! no parents for 2 weeks :-D. I am so bored this summer. rosie's birthday is in 2 days. happy that rosie. Blegh. Any wish to include me in something? let me know.
well this whole day kinda sucked. but it got way better around...10. hmmm nothing more to say.
school is out! it is summer! thank god. and the boredom starts...
yeah...im kinda slackin (not jackin) off at this whole posting thing. 7 more days! but 3 of them are fucking finals. daaaamnit. well i gotta go unload groceries. write later.

hey--so i'm writing this from chicago which rocks your mommas socks. yes--thats right. so anyway--we started our adventure when liz picked me up at 4. then it was the long ride to dulles. so we got there at like 5 and got our tickets and liz left and we went to our gate and whatnot. so we were just sitting at the gat minding our own business when... WE SEE SETH REEKER AND SONG! well see they were walking to ben and jerry's and rosies all "omfg! and jumped on them" and so they're all "woah!" and we're all "yaye!" and life was happy and we went to B&Js. twas a partay. so we're gunna get some sleep and tomorrow we're goin to the beach/chicago/ shopping/ to the pool and it will be grand! oh i almost forgot---WE GOT MATZO BALL SOUP!!! i heart it so bad. the end.

yaye! im going to chicago con rosanna today! :-D it'll rock your mothers socks off. but you guys should give us a call (301-641-8387). we'll be back on saturday. well i'm leaving in an hour so i guess i should go pack soon. toodles

i love this! blogger no lets you change the font style/color/size of the font w.o html. wow--i'm to easily amused. well on saturday i went to liz's which was rockin' except i wanted to see someone but didnt get to :-(. but it was all good. and i started painting my room on sunday and it rocks major sockage. the end.

i am back from camp but oh so campsick. camp rocked so much! i got to be in a cabin with all my best camp friends. the first week we had to add a 3rd bunk to a four person cabin. so we had a bunk in front of the fire exit and electrical outlets near wet towels--it rocked. and there were so many hot frenchies and CILFs. oh wow. well that's all for now. And all the roads we have to walk are winding And all the lights that lead us there are blinding There are many things that I would Like to say to you but I don't know how

today rocked 'cause me n rosie went up to bethesda to see hannah and jules. it rocked major socks. first we went to the pool with shane who's cool but wasnt talking 'cause he "didn't feel well". then we went up to the shopping center across from montgomery mall. then we went back to jules's house and hung out and she straighted my hair. and then we went to hannah's (which is down the street) and hung out and had fun there. the end.
